title: New: Thundercat ft. Flying Lotus – $200 TB
content:
More new Thundercat with Flying Lotus, from yet another Japanese bonus disc exclusive.

Are these the new Blues Brothers or something? You can half-imagine these guys sat in outside a jazz café in the sun sipping on something strong and smoking something illegal, then just moseying on down to the back room and jamming out something laid-back and honest just like this.

The subtlety of this track is blissful – all players riffing off each other, FlyLo‘s often bravado studio stylings held back for a very backseat affair. I can just imagine him reclining with that wide grin of his, letting Thundercat drive the track and Austin Peralta sitting shotgun. A lot of love coming from this track. Short but sweet. Looking forward to some more improv sessions stuff from the Brainfeeder camp.

Listen to $200 TB below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d10
